UserNotLinkedToMember: Gebruiker niet gekoppeld aan een lid
ErrorMemberIsAlreadyLinkedToThisThirdPar: Another member (name: %s, login: %s) is already linked to a third party %s. Remove this link first because a third party can't be linked to only a member (and vice versa).
ErrorUserPermissionAllowsToLinksToItself: For security reasons, you must be granted permissions to edit all users to be able to link a member to a user that is not yours.
ThisIsContentOfYourCard: This is details of your card
SetLinkToThirdParty: Link to a Speedealing third party
MembersListUpToDate: Lijst van geldige leden met up-to-date abonnementen
MembersListNotUpToDate: Lijst van geldige leden met abonnement out of date
NewSubscriptionDesc: This form allows you to record your subscription as a new member of the foundation. If you want to renew your subscription (if already a member), please contact foundation board instead by email %s.
NoTypeDefinedGoToSetup: Geen lid types gedefinieerd. Ga op deze pagina naar het links menu en selecteer "Opstelling - Leden soorten"
ConfirmResiliateMember: Weet u zeker dat u dit lid wilt annuleren?
ConfirmDeleteMember: Weet u zeker dat u dit lid wilt verwijderen (verwijderen van een lid zal ook al zijn inschrijvingen verwijderen)?
ConfirmDeleteSubscription: Weet u zeker dat u deze inschrijving wilt verwijderen?
ConfirmValidateMember: Weet u zeker dat u dit lid wilt valideren?
FollowingLinksArePublic: De volgende links zijn open pagina's niet beschermd door een Speedealing toestemming. They are not formated pages, provided as example to show how to list members database.
BlankSubscriptionFormDesc: Speedealing can provide you a public URL to allow external visitors to ask to subscribe to the foundation. If an online payment module is enabled, a payment form will also be automatically provided.
MemberNotOrNoMoreExpectedToSubscribe: Lid niet of wordt niet meer verwacht zich te abonneren
DescADHERENT_AUTOREGISTER_NOTIF_MAIL_SUB: Subject of the e-mail received in case of auto-inscription of a guest
DescADHERENT_AUTOREGISTER_NOTIF_MAIL: E-mail received in case of auto-inscription of a guest
DescADHERENT_ETIQUETTE_TEXT: Text printed on member address sheets
DescADHERENT_CARD_HEADER_TEXT: Tekst op de top van de lidkaarten
DescADHERENT_CARD_TEXT_RIGHT: Text printed on member cards (align on right)
DescADHERENT_CARD_FOOTER_TEXT: Tekst op de bodem van de lidkaarten
GlobalConfigUsedIfNotDefined: Text defined in Foundation module setup will be used if not defined here
MayBeOverwrited: This text can be overwrited by value defined for member's type
NoThirdPartyAssociatedToMember: Geen derde partij verbonden met dit lid
MoreActionBankDirect: Create a direct transaction record on account
MoreActionBankViaInvoice: Create an invoice and payment on account
MoreActionInvoiceOnly: Create an invoice with no payment
LinkToGeneratedPagesDesc: This screen allows you to generate PDF files with business cards for all your members or a particular member.
DocForAllMembersCards: Generate business cards for all members
DocForOneMemberCards: Generate business cards for a particular member
MembersByCountryDesc: This screen show you statistics on members by countries. Graphic depends however on Google online graph service and is available only if an internet connection is is working.
MembersByStateDesc: This screen show you statistics on members by state/provinces/canton.
MembersByTownDesc: This screen show you statistics on members by town.
MembersStatisticsDesc: Choose statistics you want to read...
TurnoverOrBudget: Turnover (for a company) or Budget (for a foundation)
CanEditAmount: Visitor can choose/edit amount of its subscription
MEMBER_NEWFORM_PAYONLINE: Jump on integrated online payment page
DOLIBARRFOUNDATION_PAYMENT_FORM:
To make your subscription payment using a bank transfer, see page http://wiki.speedealing.org/index.php/Subscribe.
To pay using a Credit Card or Paypal, click on button at bottom of this page.
ErrorBadValueForDate: Erreur : La date de fin d'adhésion ne doit être ni égale ni inférieure à la date de début.
DescADHERENT_MAILMAN_LISTS: Liste(s) à la quelle (auxquelles) inscrire les nouveaux adhérents (séparés par une virgule)
